body_html:
The commit 64f8a3b introduced a change in the API by adding the variables_to_restore() function.

You need to get the source code 0.6.0 of the example to run this example:

git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
git checkout 0.6.0
cd tensorflow/tensorflow/models/image/cifar10/
python cifar10_train.py --max_steps=20                   # Just a few steps to check the script
python cifar10_eval.py --num_examples 1000 --run_once 1  # Just once to check the script

You need to get the source code 0.6.0 of the example to run this example:

body:
The commit 64f8a3b0dc54b6125ad0ea94d0959b175b3eaad1  introduced a change in the API by adding the variables_to_restore() function.

You need to get the source code 0.6.0 of the example to run this example:

``` bash
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
git checkout 0.6.0
cd tensorflow/tensorflow/models/image/cifar10/
python cifar10_train.py --max_steps=20                   # Just a few steps to check the script
python cifar10_eval.py --num_examples 1000 --run_once 1  # Just once to check the script
```
